spotlight.title: Shab-e-Barat
spotlight.description: The Night of Forgiveness. Program includes Tilawat, speech, recitation of Naats, Surah Mulk, Nawafil, Dhikr, Dua'a, and Salaat-ul-Tasbeeh.

notificationBar.linkText: Shab-e-Barat — Tuesday 3rd February — After Isha — Tilawat, Naats, Surah Mulk, Nawafil & Dua'a
